recipesJson.name: zingers
recipesJson.author: That_Hohmie
recipesJson.description: This mix was an accident really. I feel it is pretty straight forward enough and notes aren't my strong suit so I think I will just leave it at that for now. I will be writing notes for this soon. I just really wanted to share it.

reviews.text: Seriously loving this. It's got that just right note of coconut that's smothered in raspberry flavor drenching a twinkie. In other words, it's just what it says on the tin, a raspberry zinger. Very nicely done if you're into those, and I am.
Great job on this accidental tasty treat. I'm loving bad boy brulee too. You're a very talented mixer.  Cudos and thanks
